name: Mindustry-Production-Mod
author: [orange]What42Pizza
description: [white]This mod gives you [orange]iron[white], [orange]steel[white], [orange]aluminum[white], [orange]oil processing[white], and alternative ways of generating [orange]materials[white] like [cyan]titanium[white] and [pink]thorium[white].

name: Infinitodustry
author: [cyan] Bepis
description: A big crossover episode, mashup of many cultures. Name it how you want

name: Ohno-Missiles
author: [#FCC21B]MEEP of Faith[] and [#6ECDEC]SolarPH[]
description:
With the new [#8f0101]Ballistic Missile[], you can nuke the enemies with various missile silos.

Note: Missile launchers are extremely expensive and time consuming to build. I recommend using the 250% build speed on the Trident Bomber and Phantom Builders.

name: rl_mindustry
author:
[red]Hellfire_NL (Content), 
[pink]SakuraLilly (Art, content),
[red]Deserate (Content), 
[blue]Verty (Testing)
description:
This mod contains all kinds of new resources, forges, materials and liquids.
It is still under development so feedback on the workshop is welcome

name: lead_ind
author: [white]Petru[#C7ACB4]CHIO[white]rus [orange]& [white]Defense[red]X
description: [pink]New guns, drills, crafting, materials and resourses

name: MindustryGreen
author: BurritoAlpaca and Arkanic
description: A mod that adds A new tier of resources, turrets, drills, walls, ammunition, mechs, conveyors and vaults into the game.

name: reVision
author: Slava0135
description: [#ff9800]A new way forward in vanilla style.[]

name: VanillaEnhanced
author: HolyHades
description: Adds a few things that enhance the vanilla experience.

name: Extra-Sand
author: [#FCC21B]MEEP of Faith
description:
Adds small additions for sandbox fun and testing.
[red]NOW EVERYTHING HAS BUILD COSTS FOR CAMPAIGN MWAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!

name: Fusion-Reactor-mod
author: [#79ff54]Ado[#474747]1928
description: [white]An endgame mod that adds new interesting materials and blocks to the game, most notably, the [cyan]Fusion Reactor.

name: Bronze-Mod
author: Miner28_3
description:
This mod is currently all oriented around Bronze(kind of not anymore), Right now it adds 6 materials and around 30 Buildings 
  
Very big thanks for sprites for Conveyors goes to Retrothopter!
Natrium is added thanks to Ficus150!

Looking for people who can do Sprites :) Contact me on Discord: Miner28_3#3607

https://github.com/Miner28/Bronze-Mod for more detailed description

name: Modustry-Modpack
author: ZoMadeStuff
description:
[cyan]Modpack for mindustry! [gray]
mods involved: [orange]
The End is Nigh, 
Red Sands, 
Hecodium, 
AreoMindistry, 
Vanilla Enhanced, 
Porduction Mod, 
Extended Rebuilding Modules, 
Refactorium, 
Some original content by ZoMadeStuff.

name: vbucks
author: DeltaNedas
description:
V-Bucks mod ported to Mindustry.
[yellow]also adds egg[]
requires [stat]DeltaNedas/entity-lib[].

name: NoiTech
author: [darkgray]XZimur Noi[]
description:
Description:
[darkgray]A Mindustry mod based around refinery, recycling and filtering.[]

[red]This mod does not support experimental features, campaign and might be incompatible with other mods![]

Supported Languages:[darkgray]
>  English
>  Russian[]

Links:

name: Elementary
author: GingerWolf
description: A mod that adds more elements including iron, aluminium, lithium, and more!

name: The-End-Is-Nigh
author: Best Bot
description: A [accent]End-Game[] mod. Adds new content for expanding the endgame, such as massive long range turrets, strong large units and new [accent]new tech[].

name: Futurdustry-Mod
author: Scorpi Studios
description: To meet the expectations of the future-ish.

name: Mindustry-Vanilla-Converters
author: SolarPH
description: Additional Blocks and items for Vanilla Mindustry

name: SuperRepairPoint
author: Base
description: adds SuperRepairPoints that have a better range and can heal faster than the smaller versions

name: yeeter-mod
author: tcookiem, Ski12345
description: A fun mod that adds [cyan]yeeters[] and other small additions.

name: Badsprite
author: [yellow]bad[#75BE00]Fun
description: [yellow]This modification adds new turrets!

name: mindustry-teleporter
author: sodii
description: Reimplements Teleporter from 3.5, which transfer items to other teleporters with the same color. Useful for utterly eradicating the fun.

name: routorio
author: DeltaNedas
description: Reality-shattering [gray]router[] expansion mod.

name: NewWorld-Mod
author: Nameless
description: A mod that adds a [orange]ton of stuff[]. A bigger campaign, [purple]Spore faction Stuff[] and [green]new ores!!

name: MekanisM
author: KeviTV
description:
[blue]RU[]: Этот мод добавляет множество механизмов, руд, врагов, новые источники энергии.
[red]EN[]: This mod adds a lot of mechanisms, ores, enemies, new energy sources

name: OP-EX-Mindustry-Mod
author: [red]Founder
description: A [accent]simple [red]OP []mod, [red]yay.[] I removed a few items from [accent]Anuke's Example Mod [] and edited everything to be OP (I might have removed some Electrum in the process). I used Anuke's example mod as a template and made it EXTREMELY OP. All blocks are free to craft! Created by [red]Founder.[]

name: Diamond-Ore
author: z0mbiesrock
description: Adds the [cyan]Diamond[] resource.
